description: Identify the type of media read by the highest proportion of young people in 2015.
Determine the proportion of young people reading social networking in 2015.
Calculate the average proportion of young people reading all listed media types in 2015.
Find any media type that has a significantly lower proportion of young people reading it compared to others.
Are there any clusters of media types with similar proportions of young people reading them?
Identify if there is a correlation between the type of media and the proportion of young people reading it.
Which media types have a proportion of young people reading them greater than 0.5?
Rank the media types from the highest to the lowest proportion of young people reading them.
Determine the range of proportions of young people reading the different media types in 2015.
What percentage of the media types have a proportion of young people reading them greater than 0.45?
